UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: CXCL14 displays antimicrobial activity against respiratory tract bacteria and contributes to clearance of Streptococcus pneumoniae pulmonary infection.
Literature.Author: Dai C, Basilico P, Cremona TP, Collins P, Moser B, Benarafa C, Wolf M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K-12(90-100% Inhibition=1µM),Streptococcus mitis(30-40% Inhibition=1µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae 19F(0-10% Inhibition=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(90-100% Inhibition=1µM)
